EmailTemplate.name: Service Survey - EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Mathworks Survey Request for Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
You recently contacted us on {!Case.CreatedDate} for assistance, and we would like feedback on your experience. Your Service Request {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Subject}, was closed on {!Case.ClosedDate} by {!Case.OwnerFullName}.
Below is a link to our survey. The survey should take less than 5 minutes to complete.
Link to Survey
Thank you for taking the time to complete the survey. Your feedback is important and helps us continuously improve the service to our valued customers.
Sincerely, MathWorks Support http://www.mathworks.com/support/
Please do not reply to this e-mail. This mailbox is not monitored, so replies to this e-mail will not be responded to or read.
If you would prefer not to receive surveys from MathWorks in the future, please visit the following link to update your communication preferences: https://go2.mathworks.com/preference-center
If you would like to read MathWorks privacy policy, please visit the following link: http://www.mathworks.com/company/aboutus/policies_statements/
